subject: Re: [junit] Re: Test Grouping/Partitioning
msgSnippet: ... This approach breaks down quickly as soon as you want one of your test methods to belong to more than just one group.  For example, how do you express the
messageBody:
On 7/9/07, David Saff <saff@...> wrote:

> First, I accomplish what you discuss through package organization: I
> can run test.unit.**, test.online.**, or test.** to get everything.
> This doesn't match every conceivable need, but it does match every
> need I've had so far. Would it handle your current situation?

This approach breaks down quickly as soon as you want one of your test
methods to belong to more than just one group. For example, how do
you express the fact that a test method belongs to the groups
"database" and "fast" while another one is in "database" and "slow"?

--
Cédric
